Package cs3500.easyanimator.controller

Class ControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
cs3500.easyanimator.controller.ControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerFeatures
public class ControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IControllerFeatures
This represents an instance of our controller. It handles both the view and model to delegate to their respective operations. Constructor takes in both a model of type IAnimationModel and view of type IView.

      v - The view type to output.

      public void runAnimator()
      Description copied from interface: IControllerFeatures
      Runs the animator and the overall program. Creates the views according to the type of view attached to it.
      Specified by:
      runAnimator in interface IControllerFeatures

    • createShape

      public void createShape​(java.lang.String name, IShape shape)
      Creates a new IShape in the model to be manipulated.
      Specified by:
      createShape in interface IControllerFeatures
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new shape.
      shape - the new shape and it's properties.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there already exists a shape with that name.

    • createShapeWithoutInstance

      public void createShapeWithoutInstance​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
      Creates a new IShape in the model that can be manipulated via actions. Does not require any instantiation of an IShape to be passed as an argument.
      Specified by:
      createShapeWithoutInstance in interface IControllerFeatures
      Parameters:
      name - the unique name of the shape
      type - the type of shape based on specific keywords: 'triangle' - creates a new 'ellipse' - creates a new 'rectangle' - creates a new rectangle

    • add

      public void add​(java.lang.String key, int start, int end, IActionCommand ac)
      Adds an IActionCommand to the list of operations performed on a shape for a given amount of time.
      Specified by:
      add in interface IControllerFeatures
      Parameters:
      key - the key to access the shape and list of the shapes commands in a Map
      start - the start time of the given command to be performed.
      end - the end time of the given command to be performed.
      ac - the IActionCommand that will be performed on the shape.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given IActionCommand is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the shape to add the command to doesn't exist
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is another command of the same type at the same time

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all IShape and IActionCommand from a IAnimationModel. This resets the IAnimationModel to its original state.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface IControllerFeatures

    • remove

      public void remove​(java.lang.String key, int startTick, int endTick)
      Removes a timeframe from a Shapes commands.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface IControllerFeatures
      Parameters:
      key - the key that is used to erase an IActionCommand from a shapes commands.
      startTick - the start time of the IActionCommand being removed.
      endTick - the end time of the IActionCommand being removed.

    • updateReadOnly

      public IReadOnlyModel updateReadOnly()
      Returns the most up-to-date model of the controller.
      Specified by:
      updateReadOnly in interface IControllerFeatures

    • removeShape

      public void removeShape​(java.lang.String key)
      Description copied from interface: IControllerFeatures
      Removes the shape from the Map and all of its animations.
      Specified by:
      removeShape in interface IControllerFeatures
      Parameters:
      key - the shapes key in the Map so that it can be accessed and removed.
